alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills and the Diablo Range; East Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 7:20AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Contra Costa County through 745 AM PST... At 717 AM PST, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Clayton, or near Concord, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Dangerous lightning, pea size hail, and potential for gusty winds. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People should seek shelter from lightning. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Concord, Antioch, San Ramon, Walnut Creek, Pittsburg, Danville, Oakley, Pleasant Hill, Lafayette, Brentwood, Discovery Bay, Clayton, West Pittsburg, Blackhawk-Camino Tassajara, Blackhawk, Collinsville, West Pittsburg Cdp, Alamo, Knightsen and Byron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills and the Diablo Range; East Bay Interior Valleys
